blocks.name: com
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the class of natural numbers.
blocks.origin: const class com { _om }

blocks.name: diff.com.s
diff.com.c
diff.com.w
df-om
blocks.content: Define the class of natural numbers, which are all ordinal numbers that are less than every limit ordinal, i.e., all finite ordinals. Our definition is a variant of the Definition of N of [BellMachover] p. 471. See ~ dfom2 for an alternate definition. Later, when we assume the Axiom of Infinity, we show ` _om ` is a set in ~ omex , and ` _om ` can then be defined per ~ dfom3 (the smallest inductive set) and ~ dfom4 . _Note_: the natural numbers ` _om ` are a subset of the ordinal numbers ~ df-on . They are completely different from the natural numbers ` NN ` ( ~ df-nn ) that are a subset of the complex numbers defined much later in our development, although the two sets have analogous properties and operations defined on them. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1994.)

blocks.name: dfom2
blocks.content: An alternate definition of the set of natural numbers ` _om ` . Definition 7.28 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 42, who use the symbol K_I for the inner class builder of non-limit ordinal numbers (see ~ nlimon ). (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfom2(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wceq(com, crab(s0, con0, wss(csuc(cv(s0)), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1)))))))
} = {
  eqtri(com, crab(s0, con0, wss(csuc(cv(s0)), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1)))))), crab(s0, con0, wal(hs0, wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  df-om(s0, hs0)
  rabbiia(s0, con0, wal(hs0, wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wss(csuc(cv(s0)), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))))
  syl6bbr(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wal(hs0, wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wss(csuc(cv(s0)), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))))))
  albidv(hs0, wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1)))))))
  bitrd(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1)))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))))))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wlim(cv(hs0)))))))
  pm5.74da(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1)))))), wi(wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wlim(cv(hs0))))))
  imbi12d(wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  onsssuc(cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  ontri1(cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wlim(cv(hs0))))))
  elrab(s1, cv(hs0), con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))), wn(wlim(cv(hs0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wlim(cv(s1)), wlim(cv(hs0)))
  limeq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  3bitri(wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wlim(cv(hs0)))))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wlim(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  imbi1i(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wlim(cv(hs0))))
  pm4.71ri(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  mpan(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  limelon(cv(hs0), universe)
  impexp(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  pm5.74i(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wi(wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wlim(cv(hs0))))))
  syl5bb(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wi(wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wlim(cv(hs0))))), wi(wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wn(wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  con34b(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  imbi2d(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wn(wlim(cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  ibar(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wn(wlim(cv(hs0))))
  syl5bbr(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1)))))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1)))))))
  impexp(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))))
  imbi1d(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))))
  impbid2(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))))
  ancrd(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s0)), con0))
  suceloni(cv(s0))
  ex(wcel(csuc(cv(s0)), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  onelon(csuc(cv(s0)), cv(hs0))
  dfss2(hs0, csuc(cv(s0)), crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1)))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s0), con0))
  diff.con0.s(s1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, wlim(cv(hs0)))
  diff.wlim.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(csuc(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s1, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s1)))))
}

thm dfom2(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  âŠ¢ _om = { s0 âˆˆ On | suc(s0)âŠ† { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)} }
} = {
  eqtri(com, { s0 âˆˆ On | suc(s0)âŠ† { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)} }, { s0 âˆˆ On | âˆ€(hs0,(Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0))})
  df-om(s0, hs0)
  rabbiia(s0, con0, âˆ€(hs0,(Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0)), suc(s0)âŠ† { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)})
  syl6bbr(s0 âˆˆ On, âˆ€(hs0,(Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0)), suc(s0)âŠ† { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)}, âˆ€(hs0,(hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)})))
  albidv(hs0, s0 âˆˆ On, (Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0), (hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)}))
  bitrd(s0 âˆˆ On, (Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0), (hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)}), (hs0 âˆˆ On â†’(hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)})))
  syl6rbbr(s0 âˆˆ On, (Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0), (hs0 âˆˆ On â†’(hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)})), (hs0 âˆˆ On â†’(Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0 â†’(hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Â¬ Lim(hs0)))))
  pm5.74da(s0 âˆˆ On, hs0 âˆˆ On, (hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)}), (Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0 â†’(hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Â¬ Lim(hs0))))
  imbi12d((s0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ On), hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0), hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)}, Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0, (hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Â¬ Lim(hs0)))
  ancoms(s0 âˆˆ On, hs0 âˆˆ On, (hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†” Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0))
  bitr3d((hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ On), hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0), Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0, hs0 âŠ† s0)
  onsssuc(hs0, s0)
  ontri1(hs0, s0)
  a1i((s0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ On), (hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)} â†”(hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Â¬ Lim(hs0))))
  elrab(s1, hs0, con0, Â¬ Lim(s1), Â¬ Lim(hs0))
  notbid(s1 = hs0, Lim(s1), Lim(hs0))
  limeq(s1, hs0)
  3bitri((Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0), (hs0 âˆˆ On â†’(Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0 â†’(hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Â¬ Lim(hs0)))), ((hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Lim(hs0))â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0), (hs0 âˆˆ On â†’(Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0)))
  imbi1i(Lim(hs0), s0 âˆˆ hs0, (hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Lim(hs0)))
  pm4.71ri(Lim(hs0), hs0 âˆˆ On)
  mpan(Lim(hs0), hs0 âˆˆ On, hs0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  vex(hs0)
  limelon(hs0, universe)
  impexp(hs0 âˆˆ On, Lim(hs0), s0 âˆˆ hs0)
  pm5.74i(hs0 âˆˆ On, (Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0), (Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0 â†’(hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Â¬ Lim(hs0))))
  syl5bb(hs0 âˆˆ On, (Lim(hs0)â†’ s0 âˆˆ hs0), (Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0 â†’(hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Â¬ Lim(hs0))), (Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0 â†’ Â¬ Lim(hs0)))
  con34b(Lim(hs0), s0 âˆˆ hs0)
  imbi2d(hs0 âˆˆ On, Â¬ s0 âˆˆ hs0, Â¬ Lim(hs0), (hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Â¬ Lim(hs0)))
  ibar(hs0 âˆˆ On, Â¬ Lim(hs0))
  syl5bbr(s0 âˆˆ On, (hs0 âˆˆ On â†’(hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)})), (hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)}), ((hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0))â†’ hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)}))
  impexp(hs0 âˆˆ On, hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0), hs0 âˆˆ { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)})

  impbid2(s0 âˆˆ On, (hs0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)), hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0))
  simpr(hs0 âˆˆ On, hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0))
  ancrd(s0 âˆˆ On, hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0), hs0 âˆˆ On)
  syl(s0 âˆˆ On, (hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ On), suc(s0)âˆˆ On)
  suceloni(s0)
  ex(suc(s0)âˆˆ On, hs0 âˆˆ suc(s0), hs0 âˆˆ On)
  onelon(suc(s0), hs0)
  dfss2(hs0, suc(s0), { s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)})
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 âˆˆ On)
  diff.con0.s(s1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, Lim(hs0))
  diff.wlim.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(suc(s0))
  diff.hs0.c({ s1 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s1)})
}

blocks.name: elom
blocks.content: Membership in omega. The left conjunct can be eliminated if we assume the Axiom of Infinity; see ~ elom3 . (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm elom(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, com), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wal(s0, wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, com, con0, wal(s0, wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(s0))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  df-om(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elom(setvar s0, class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ _om â†”(c0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(Lim(s0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ s0))))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, com, con0, âˆ€(s0,(Lim(s0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ s0)), âˆ€(s0,(Lim(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0)))
  albidv(s0, hs0 = c0, (Lim(s0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0), (Lim(s0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ s0))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c0, Lim(s0), hs0 âˆˆ s0, c0 âˆˆ s0)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, s0)
  df-om(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
  diff.hs0.w(âˆ€(s0,(Lim(s0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: omsson
blocks.content: Omega is a subset of ` On ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Jun-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: limomss
blocks.content: The class of natural numbers is a subclass of any (infinite) limit ordinal. Exercise 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 44. Remarkably, our proof does not require the Axiom of Infinity. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm limomss(class c0) {
  |- wi(wlim(c0), wss(com, c0))
} = {
  mpcom(wlim(c0), wss(com, c0), word(c0))
  limord(c0)
  sylbi(word(c0), wi(wlim(c0), wss(com, c0)), wo(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(c0, con0)))
  ordeleqon(c0)
  jaoi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(c0, con0), wi(wlim(c0), wss(com, c0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, con0), wlim(c0), wss(com, c0))
  ssrdv(hs0, com, c0, wa(wcel(c0, con0), wlim(c0)))
  imp(wcel(c0, con0), wlim(c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  com23(wcel(c0, con0), wlim(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl5(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), com), wi(wlim(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wal(hs1, wi(wlim(cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wal(hs1, wi(wlim(cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  elom(hs1, cv(hs0))
  spcgv(hs1, c0, con0, wi(wlim(cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wlim(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wlim(cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wlim(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  limeq(cv(hs1), c0)
  eleq2(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))
  a1d(wceq(c0, con0), wlim(c0), wss(com, c0))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, con0), wss(com, c0), wss(com, con0))
  omsson()
  sseq2(c0, con0, com)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wlim(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wlim(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm limomss(class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (Lim(c0)â†’ _om âŠ† c0)
} = {
  mpcom(Lim(c0), _om âŠ† c0, Ord(c0))
  limord(c0)
  sylbi(Ord(c0), (Lim(c0)â†’ _om âŠ† c0), (c0 âˆˆ On âˆ¨ c0 = On))
  ordeleqon(c0)
  jaoi(c0 âˆˆ On, c0 = On, (Lim(c0)â†’ _om âŠ† c0))
  ex(c0 âˆˆ On, Lim(c0), _om âŠ† c0)
  ssrdv(hs0, com, c0, (c0 âˆˆ On âˆ§ Lim(c0)))
  imp(c0 âˆˆ On, Lim(c0), (hs0 âˆˆ _om â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0))
  com23(c0 âˆˆ On, Lim(c0), hs0 âˆˆ _om, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  syl5(c0 âˆˆ On, hs0 âˆˆ _om, (Lim(c0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0), âˆ€(hs1,(Lim(hs1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ hs1)))
  simprbi(hs0 âˆˆ _om, âˆ€(hs1,(Lim(hs1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ hs1)), hs0 âˆˆ On)
  elom(hs1, hs0)
  spcgv(hs1, c0, con0, (Lim(hs1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ hs1), (Lim(c0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0))
  imbi12d(hs1 = c0, Lim(hs1), hs0 âˆˆ hs1, Lim(c0), hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  limeq(hs1, c0)
  eleq2(hs1, c0, hs0)
  a1d(c0 = On, Lim(c0), _om âŠ† c0)
  mpbiri(c0 = On, _om âŠ† c0, _om âŠ† On)
  omsson()
  sseq2(c0, con0, com)

}

blocks.name: nnon
blocks.content: A natural number is an ordinal number. (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-1994.)

blocks.name: nnoni
blocks.content: A natural number is an ordinal number. (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-1994.)

blocks.name: nnord
blocks.content: A natural number is ordinal. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-1995.)

blocks.name: ordom
blocks.content: Omega is ordinal. Theorem 7.32 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ordom() {
  |- word(com)
} = {
  mp3an(word(com), wtr(com), wss(com, con0), word(con0))
  mpgbir(hs0, wtr(com), wal(hs1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), com)), wcel(cv(hs0), com))))
  dftr2(hs0, hs1, com)

  imp(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(cv(hs0), com))
  3imtr4g(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(cv(hs0), com), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wal(hs2, wi(wlim(cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wal(hs2, wi(wlim(cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))))
  anim12d(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wal(hs2, wi(wlim(cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wal(hs2, wi(wlim(cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  onelon(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  alimdv(hs2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wlim(cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wi(wlim(cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  a2d(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wlim(cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  com12(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wlim(cv(hs2)), wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  expd(wlim(cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))

  limord(cv(hs2))
  ordtr(cv(hs2))

  elom(hs2, cv(hs0))
  omsson()
  ordon()
  trssord(com, con0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs1.c(com)
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
}

blocks.name: elnn
blocks.content: A member of a natural number is a natural number. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1998.)

blocks.name: omon
blocks.content: The class of natural numbers ` _om ` is either an ordinal number (if we accept the Axiom of Infinity) or the proper class of all ordinal numbers (if we deny the Axiom of Infinity). Remark in [TakeutiZaring] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 10-May-1998.)

blocks.name: omelon2
blocks.content: Omega is an ordinal number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Jan-2013.)

blocks.name: nnlim
blocks.content: A natural number is not a limit ordinal. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnlim(class c0) {

} = {

  simprbi(wcel(c0, com), wal(hs0, wi(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, con0))
  elom(hs0, c0)

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wlim(c0), wcel(c0, c0))
  limeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, c0)

  diff.hs0.w(wi(wlim(c0), wcel(c0, c0)))
}

blocks.name: omssnlim
blocks.content: The class of natural numbers is a subclass of the class of non-limit ordinal numbers. Exercise 4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 42. (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: limom
blocks.content: Omega is a limit ordinal. Theorem 2.8 of [BellMachover] p. 473. Our proof, however, does not require the Axiom of Infinity. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-1995.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)

} = {

  ordom()

blocks.name: peano2b
blocks.content: A class belongs to omega iff its successor does. (Contributed by NM, 3-Dec-1995.)

blocks.name: nnsuc
blocks.content: A nonzero natural number is a successor. (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnsuc(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, com, wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0)))))

} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, com, wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, con0, wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0)))))
  mt3d(wa(wcel(c0, com), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, con0, wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0)))), wlim(c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wlim(c0)))

  nnord(c0)

  adantr(word(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(c0, cuni(c0)), wn(wrex(s0, con0, wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0)))))))
  orduninsuc(s0, c0)

  biimpri(w3a(word(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, cuni(c0))), wlim(c0))
  df-lim(c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wrex(s0, con0, wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, com, wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0))))))
  reximdv2(s0, con0, com, wcel(c0, com), wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0))), wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0))))

  ancrd(wcel(c0, com), wceq(c0, csuc(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), com))

  peano2b(cv(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, com)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ssnlim
blocks.content: An ordinal subclass of non-limit ordinals is a class of natural numbers. Exercise 7 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 42. (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssnlim(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(word(c0), wss(c0, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0)))))), wss(c0, com))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(word(c0), wss(c0, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0)))))), wss(c0, com)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  mpbird(wa(word(c0), wss(c0, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0)))))), wss(c0, com), wn(wcel(com, c0)))
  adantl(word(c0), wss(c0, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0))))), wn(wcel(com, c0)))
  mt2i(wss(c0, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0))))), wcel(com, c0), wlim(com))
  limom()
  syl6(wss(c0, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0))))), wcel(com, c0), wn(wlim(com)), wcel(com, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0))))))
  ssel(c0, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0)))), com)
  simprbi(wcel(com, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0))))), wn(wlim(com)), wcel(com, con0))
  elrab(s0, com, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0))), wn(wlim(com)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), com), wlim(cv(s0)), wlim(com))
  limeq(cv(s0), com)
  adantr(word(c0), wss(c0, crab(s0, con0, wn(wlim(cv(s0))))), wb(wss(c0, com), wn(wcel(com, c0))))
  mpan2(word(c0), wb(wss(c0, com), wn(wcel(com, c0))), word(com))
  ordom()
  ordtri1(c0, com)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wlim(com))
  diff.wlim.s(s0, com)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}

  limeq(s0, com)
  adantr(Ord(c0), c0 âŠ† { s0 âˆˆ On | Â¬ Lim(s0)}, (c0 âŠ† _om â†” Â¬ _om âˆˆ c0))
  mpan2(Ord(c0), (c0 âŠ† _om â†” Â¬ _om âˆˆ c0), Ord(_om))
  ordom()
  ordtri1(c0, com)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, Lim(_om))
  diff.wlim.s(s0, com)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: omsinds
blocks.content: Strong (or "total") induction principle over the finite ordinals. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm omsinds(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, com), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), com), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w2), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  wfis3(s0, s1, c0, com, cep, w0, w1, w2)
  mp2(wwe(cep, com), wss(com, con0), wwe(cep, con0))
  omsson()
  epweon()
  wess(com, con0, cep)
  epse(com)
  sylbid(wcel(cv(s0), com), wral(s1, cpred(cep, com, cv(s0)), w2), w1, wral(s1, cv(s0), w2))
  raleqdv(s1, cpred(cep, com, cv(s0)), cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), com), w2)
  eqtrd(cpred(cep, com, cv(s0)), cv(s0), cin(com, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), com))
  predep(cv(s0), com, com)
  sylib(wcel(cv(s0), com), wceq(cin(com, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), com))
  mp2b(wi(wcel(cv(s0), com), wss(cv(s0), com)), word(com), wtr(com))
  ordom()
  ordtr(com)
  trss(com, cv(s0))
  sseqin2(cv(s0), com)
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.cep.s(s0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, cep, com, cv(s0))
  diff.cep.s(s1)
  diff.com.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm omsinds(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ _om â†’ w0)
  âŠ£ (s0 = s1 â†’(w1 â†” w2))
  âŠ£ (s0 = c0 â†’(w1 â†” w0))
  âŠ£ (s0 âˆˆ _om â†’(âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ s0, w2)â†’ w1))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  wfis3(s0, s1, c0, com, cep, w0, w1, w2)
  mp2(âˆˆ â‰¤ _om, _om âŠ† On, âˆˆ â‰¤ On)
  omsson()
  epweon()
  wess(com, con0, cep)
  epse(com)
  sylbid(s0 âˆˆ _om, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ Pred(âˆˆ, _om, s0), w2), w1, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ s0, w2))
  raleqdv(s1, Pred(âˆˆ, _om, s0), s0, s0 âˆˆ _om, w2)
  eqtrd(Pred(âˆˆ, _om, s0), s0, (_om â‹‚ s0), s0 âˆˆ _om)
  predep(s0, com, com)
  sylib(s0 âˆˆ _om, (_om â‹‚ s0)= s0, s0 âŠ† _om)
  mp2b((s0 âˆˆ _om â†’ s0 âŠ† _om), Ord(_om), Tr(_om))
  ordom()
  ordtr(com)
  trss(com, s0)
  sseqin2(s0, com)
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.cep.s(s0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, cep, com, s0)
  diff.cep.s(s1)
  diff.com.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
